relatedBlades.title: Email security services
relatedBlades.subtitle: Secure employee and vendor accounts with email security
relatedBlades.copy: Preemptively detect and protect against email-borne malware, BEC, and multi-channel phishing attacks with Cloudflare's Email Security.

imageAssetFile.title: Email Security Services & Solutions - Hero image

relatedBlades.title: Combat phishing threats with email security services
relatedBlades.copy:
Today's sophisticated phishing attacks are still getting through traditional secure email gateways (SEGs) and bypassing email authentication measures. Campaigns like malware-less business email compromise (BEC), [account takeovers](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/solutions/account-takeover-prevention/), insider threats, or QR phishing threats are difficult to detect, leaving organizations, employees, and vendors vulnerable to exploitation.

With email security services, organizations can isolate and block multi-channel attacks, detect highly-deceptive BEC attempts, and block malicious attachments and links to protect employees and vendors before, during, and after email delivery.
relatedBlades.learnMoreText: Learn more about Email Security Services

relatedBlades.title: Benefits of using email security services
keyFeature: Preventing ransomware and other malware based attacks by blocking malicious links on end-user devices
Stopping business email compromise (BEC) and other email fraud by detecting employee and vendor impersonation attempts
Blocking and isolating multi-channel attacks, including QR code phishing scams and deferred attacks
Enhancing existing Gmail and Microsoft built-in security services while improving email hygiene with anti-spam, anti-spoof, and anti-malware features

relatedBlades.title: Use cases for email security services

columnContent.title: Stop business email compromise threats
columnContent.description: Advanced techniques for fighting financial phishing fraud.
columnContent.learnMoreText: Learn how to stop BEC threats

columnContent.title: Email link isolation
columnContent.description: Opening suspicious email links in an isolated browser neutralizes potential malware. Learn more about Cloudflare Browser Isolation.

columnContent.title: Reduce phishing risks with Zero Trust
columnContent.description: Learn why security decision-makers are concerned about multi-channel phishing and how Zero Trust can decrease risk and improve business continuity.

cards.title: Phishing retro scan
cards.description: With Cloudflare's phishing retro scan, you can immediately identify the active threats that have already reached your users, including malicious emails that have evaded existing defenses.

cards.title: Combat phishing threats
cards.description: "Leverage Zero Trust to Combat Multichannel Phishing Threats," a study conducted by Forrester Consulting, explores the relevance of applying Zero Trust to defend against modern phishing threats.

cards.title: Free phishing risk assessment
cards.description: Sign up to request your complimentary phishing risk assessment and see what attacks are getting through your existing email defenses.

contentfulAsset.description: Icon of a hand offering help

relatedBlades.title: Email security for critical industries
relatedBlades.copy: In today's digital environment, robust email security solutions are a must-have across all industries, including [government](https://www.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-for-government/), [ecommerce](https://www.cloudflare.com/ecommerce/), [healthcare](https://www.cloudflare.com/healthcare/), and [finance](https://www.cloudflare.com/financial-services/). A proactive email security approach is critical to maintaining data confidentiality, safeguarding financial transactions, protecting sensitive government communications, and ensuring business continuity.

features.title: The eight ways phishing attacks bypass sandbox technology
features.description: Learn about the techniques attackers use to bypass sandbox technology, and more effective ways to secure your email from phishing.

relatedBlades.bladeName: Email Security Services & Solutions - Email Security Services FAQ
relatedBlades.title: Email Security Services FAQ

content.value: Email security services protect emails from cyberthreats such as ransomware, quishing scams, and business email compromise (BEC). Email security services typically include features such as encryption, anti-spam, malware detection, anti-spoof, and user awareness to protect organizations from email-borne attacks.

Cloud-based email security is a subset of email security services that helps secure email communication delivered and managed through cloud infrastructure, and designed to provide a comprehensive protection.
Yes. 91% of all cyber attacks begin with a phishing email (2020 Deloitte). It is imperative to adopt effective email security to prevent phishing threats
